performance_metrics.name: Latency (Network Round Trip)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum acceptable delay between data request and response. Critical for real-time control and interactive applications.

performance_metrics.name: Throughput (Data Processing)
performance_metrics.description: Number of data events processed per second. Dependent on application complexity and data volume.

performance_metrics.name: Data Processing Accuracy
performance_metrics.description: Percentage of correctly processed data events. Crucial for decision-making based on edge data.

performance_metrics.name: Resource Utilization (CPU, Memory)
performance_metrics.description: Maximum sustained utilization to ensure optimal performance and prevent bottlenecks.  Considers peak load scenarios.

performance_metrics.name: Network Bandwidth (Ingress/Egress)
performance_metrics.description: Capacity to handle data transfer between edge devices, edge nodes, and the cloud.  Higher for applications with significant data streams.

performance_metrics.name: Response Time (Data Visualization)
performance_metrics.description: Time taken for data visualization or reporting based on processed data.  Determines the responsiveness of dashboards and reports.

implementation_requirements.name: Hardware Platform
implementation_requirements.specifications: Industrial-grade servers (x86 or ARM), ruggedized edge devices, or specialized embedded systems.  Minimum 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD storage.
implementation_requirements.description: Selection based on application requirements (processing power, connectivity, environmental conditions).

implementation_requirements.name: Network Connectivity
implementation_requirements.specifications: Ethernet (1Gbps or higher), 5G/LTE for remote locations. Redundant network paths.
implementation_requirements.description: Reliable and secure network infrastructure is fundamental.

implementation_requirements.name: Data Security
implementation_requirements.specifications: TLS 1.3 encryption, Secure Boot, Role-Based Access Control (RBAC), Regular Security Audits (ISO 27001 compliance recommended).
implementation_requirements.description: Protection of data at rest and in transit.  Address potential vulnerabilities.

implementation_requirements.name: Edge Orchestration Platform
implementation_requirements.specifications: Software platform for managing and deploying applications to edge devices (e.g., Kubernetes Edge, AWS IoT Greengrass, Azure IoT Edge).
implementation_requirements.description: Centralized control and management of distributed edge computing infrastructure.

implementation_requirements.name: Remote Management & Monitoring
implementation_requirements.specifications: Secure remote access tools, automated monitoring dashboards, alerts, and diagnostics.
implementation_requirements.description: Essential for proactive maintenance and troubleshooting.

implementation_requirements.name: Power Management
implementation_requirements.specifications: Redundant power supplies, UPS systems for short-term outages, power monitoring and control.
implementation_requirements.description: Reliable power supply is critical for continuous operation.
